Text:
You are very wlecome. 

We were starting to think no one was interested in the 'ordinary' kink sites with all the new stuff around ;)

I love HT and DB with Claire as Director.  I wouldn't cry if I didn't have access to the other Kink sites.  It's also good to see Matt back doing his thing at SB.

And, of course, you guys are the true kings for making it all possible!
Personally, I'm glad that Matt is gone from Kink, so I'm not checking out his new stuff. Just not into men dominating women.
